credit_line: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
title: Textile Design: Diomedes
provenance: Wolfgang Ruf, Galerie Ruf, Rastatt, Germany
medium: Brush and  gouache, black ink, graphite on paper, mounted on smooth cream paper
description: Pair of stylized purple and orange leaves, arranged within a diamond-shaped pinkish background, formed by crossed diagonal purple lines (on the pink background).  At left, tip of purple leaf suggests pattern repeat.
name: Drawing
